channel.title: Project destiny 1.8 pking help?
channel.description: When i attack someone in wild my guy does the pking emote for the specified weapon the first time he attacks but then he just stands there, and does damage but the emote stops working. also if anyone can help me fix this would they be able to help me fix it so when i attack someone they face the opponent?
